mission_statement: Cansel helps organizations in the engineering, surveying, construction, mining, architecture, manufacturing, printing, utilities, forestry, and government sectors measure, analyze, design, and build more efficiently and profitably. The company has been providing tailored solutions to its clients for over 50 years.

products_and_services.main_activity: Distributor of land-based positioning systems in Canada
products_and_services.value_proposition: Through the consolidated strength of its businesses, Cansel provides solutions tailored to individual project needs while addressing broader organizational challenges. Clients can choose solution-based packages to maximize technology investments and simplify project delivery across industries.
